long_description: Chain removing tools don't get any beefier than this Pedro's professional shop chain tool. Full-hand size handle stabilizes chain during assembly or removal. Large ergonomic handles enhance comfort and turning leverage. Side wings hold links securely together while connecting the chain. Precision spacing is compatible with most chains, including most 10-speed chains. Includes two replacement pins, stored in handle.
short_description: Chain removing tools don't get any beefier than this Pedro's professional shop chain tool.
